scripts.release:major: changelog --major && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(CHANGELOG): updated with latest changes' && npm version major -m 'chore(npm): increase major pacakge version to %s'
scripts.release:minor: changelog --minor && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(CHANGELOG): updated with latest changes' && npm version minor -m 'chore(npm): increase minor pacakge version to %s'
scripts.release:patch: changelog --patch && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(CHANGELOG): updated with latest changes' && npm version patch -m 'chore(npm): increase patch pacakge version to %s'
